articles.title: American Airlines Wants U.S. to Drop International Flyer Covid Test Requirements - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: American Airlines has added its voice to the growing chorus of travel industry companies calling for an end of pre-departure Covid testing rules for arriving...
articles.content:
American says pre-departure testing rules for travelers to the U.S. hinder the international recovery. Edward Russell / Skift
